552360.name: Masquerada: Songs and Shadows - Original Soundtrack
552360.description:
The Masquerada: Songs and Shadows Original Soundtrack by Josh Whelchel is a musical tour de force that features 40 tracks of original compositions, including the ethereal vocal piece "Broken Clay" featuring singer-songwriter iNCH.

Please note the full set of 320 kbps MP3-format files will be placed into the Steam library music folder. Previously, you would find it in the Masquerada folder of your Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Masquerada Songs and Shadows\Soundtrack
552360.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
